text:
Cremilda Santana dos Santos (Ilhéus, May 15, 1946) as Gaga de Ilhéus is a Brazilian actress and comedian.
Career.
She became known between 2015 and 2017 for participating in the boards of the program "Pânico na Band" as 'As Gagas de" "Ilhéus', <nowiki/>'Desempregagas<nowiki/>' and 'Largagas e Peladas"."
